com.esri.mo2.map.draw
Class Util

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--com.esri.mo2.map.draw.Util
public class Util
extends Object

This class defines 6 default renderers and a set of convenient static methods that create various renderers based on the input parameters.

constructDefaultRenderer

public static Renderer constructDefaultRenderer(int featureType)
Create a default renderer with given feature type. The default color is red.

Parameters:
featureType -
Returns:
a BaseSimpleRenderer object

constructRenderer

public static Renderer constructRenderer(int featureType,
                                         Color color)
Create a renderer with given color and feature type. The default marker symbol size is 6.0 and line stroke witdth is 1.0.

Parameters:
color -
featureType -
Returns:
a BaseSimpleRenderer object

constructSelectionRenderer

public static Renderer constructSelectionRenderer(int featureType,
                                                  Color color)
